short_summary: High Density Mobile Storage Units installation
description: This solicitation is for the procurement of High Density Mobile Storage Units for installation on mechanically assisted carriages. See attachment for details.
full_summary:
### High Density Mobile Shelving Tender Announcement
#### Solicitation Number: 1000248166
#### Publication Date: March 1, 2023
#### Tender Closing Date: March 21, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST (North America)
#### Solicitation Type: Request for Proposal (RFP) 
#### Tender Status: No Longer Accepting Proposals

Health Canada is soliciting proposals for the installation of High Density Mobile Storage Units on mechanically assisted carriages. 

The proposal shall include the necessary goods and services to ensure reliable and efficient storage operation functionality while meeting health and safety standards. 

#### Key Requirements
- Installation of three (3) High Density Mobile Storage Units on mechanically assisted carriages.
- Units shall be manufactured in compliance with relevant health, safety, and building codes.
- Proposal must include regular maintenance schedules and provide corresponding contingency plans.

#### Notice of Suspension or Cancellation
If the contract is cancelled or suspended in accordance with Clause 24-1038, the contractor shall not be entitled to any claim for compensation or damages.

#### Trade Agreements
- The proposal must be submitted based on the following trade agreements: Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Atlantic Procurement Agreement, and Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA).

#### Regions of Opportunity
- The proposed delivery will take place in the National Capital Region (NCR).

#### Contact Information
For additional information or to submit your proposal, please contact:
Shallee Doll
Contracting and Procurement Services
Health Canada
</br>
Email: shallee.doll@hc-sc.gc.ca
Phone: (613) 297-4875

#### Attachments
The full solicitation package is available for download on the CanadaBUs Canada webpage: [descriptor accéssaires]= https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/01/1676f686454b206eb7c461b247b30187/bilingual_npp.docx
